      • addComponent

        @Deprecated
public void addComponent(Component c)
        Deprecated. use registerEventProvider() or registerEventListener() instead
        Adds an unspecific component to the framework. No initialization is performed and no buffers are allocated.
        Parameters:
        c - the component to be added
